# Overview
You need data to do a data analysis - surprise! 

This module discusses data. What it is, where to get it, how to load and store it, and some other basics of that sort.

# Learning Objectives

* Be familiar with basic data types.
* Be aware of data structure.
* Know how to work with data formats in R.
*

The module consists of the following units:

* [Basic data types](./data-types-basic/data-types-basic.qmd)
* [Complex data types](./data-types-complex/data-types-complex.qmd)
* [Data storage formats](./data-storage-formats/data-storage-formats.qmd)
* [Data formats in R](./data-formats-r/data-formats-r.qmd)
* [The data generation process](./data-generation-process/data-generation-process.qmd)
